list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an extensive area of land in the country, usually with a large house, owned by one person, family, or organization.
all the money and property owned by a particular person, especially at death.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: in his will, he divided his estate between his wife and daughter
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Trong ý chí của mình, anh ta chia bất động sản giữa vợ và con gái

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a class or order regarded as forming part of the body politic, in particular (in Britain), one of the three groups constituting Parliament, now the Lords spiritual (the heads of the Church), the Lords temporal (the peerage), and the Commons. They are also known as the three estates.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the unions are no longer an estate of the realm
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Các đoàn thể không còn là một bất động sản của vương quốc

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a particular state, period, or condition in life.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: programs for the improvement of man's estate
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: các chương trình để cải thiện bất động sản của con người
